website_summaries.verdict: Targus takes its familiar Corporate Traveler line and adds a butterfly-style zipper to the Targus Zip-Thru, hopefully aiding your way through airport security checkpoints.
pros: may speed your way through airport-security checkpoints
cons: The TSA agent may force you to take your laptop out anyway

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but Done Well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Clean, classic lines. Nothing too modern (which risks going out of style). Nice details on zipper tabs, belt hooks, handles, and logo. Solid zipper construction. Well designed compartments. Overall a very practical and professional option. With regard to sizing: my 15.6" laptop fits very snugly (but not forced). Laptops any larger may be a bit too snug.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Padded shoulder strap (a rubbery type of material that helps it stick to my shoulder without feeling sticky) and has a nice plastic/rubber bottom inside the laptop compartment to actually hold ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had MANY Targus bags for years for my laptops. This one far exceeds the others. Padded shoulder strap (a rubbery type of material that helps it stick to my shoulder without feeling sticky) and has a nice plastic/rubber bottom inside the laptop compartment to actually hold the laptop up off the bottom of the bag. The pockets inside hold a LOT of papers/cords/peripherals too but don't make the bag so bulky that I can't travel with it for work.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but missing one important thing...
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I needed: secure padded compartment for computer, another compart for books and such, a side area for things like iPod and mouse. The middle zipper, for the checkpoint unfolding, actually works great for files and papers since it prevents them from bending. But there is a huge design flaw: it does not stand up. It always falls towards the side pocket side.
customer_reviews.author: Aeneas

customer_reviews.title: He takes it to work with him every day and has had nothing but good things to say about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance for his birthday and he absolutely loves it. He takes it to work with him every day and has had nothing but good things to say about it. One of the cooler features is that it stays upright when you put it on the ground, so you don't have to worry about it falling over and all of your stuff spilling out if you didn't close it. This product is good quality and worth the money I would say.
customer_reviews.author: cafeconcrema

customer_reviews.title: Great case for laptops
customer_reviews.text: I had to return one of these cases to a company when I left. I did not want to be without so I ordered one right after. Great quality case for protecting your laptop. Great for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Longacre

customer_reviews.title: I would like a slightly roomier bag as I have had to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older bag which was much more roomy. I can get everything in this, but there is no room to spare. I would like a slightly roomier bag as I have had to leave some things out that I used to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like my Targus bag
customer_reviews.text: So far this case is holding up well in my travels. The handles, strap and hardware are substantial. I'm able to fit just about everything I need into it. And there are sufficient compartments to help keep things reasonably well-organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Z

customer_reviews.title: Normally, for business use, very reliable, but 1 broke (out of 12). Should be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: only 1 in about a dozen where the shoulder strap attaches to the bag breaks (detached from the bag). totally surprised by this, some of these bags are over 5 years old, and the only one to break is new (1 month).
customer_reviews.author: Gene G.

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag in the last month. Since then I have taken two different trips and both times it was so simple to unzip the center section of the bag and lay it down on the belt to go through the xray. I have had a TSA person question me about the bag but only to make sure I had put only the laptop in one side. Another TSA guy was excited to finally see one of the new bags. It is very roomy and I would heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: I. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for people who need something durable to use every single day. It's very big, I keep a laptop, 170 watt power supply, mouse, mouse pad, second LCD monitor, and a tablet in it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bailey

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made. Bought to minimize airport hassle and it did not disappoint. It is well constructed with a lot of pockets. Sailed through airport security at JFK (among others) without having to take anything out. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and light bag
customer_reviews.text: Terrific laptop bag. It has nice features not even listed, like precurved handles that naturally come together with a slight magnetic catch. No more fishing for dangling handles! Laptop protection seems good and top access is easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: This bag is horrible. I purchased two of them one for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is horrible. I purchased two of them one for myself and one for a employee. We use them daily and the shoulder strap on both bags ripped one in 6 months and the other in 8 months of using them. The problem is the shoulder strap is not one solid piece of ballistic nylon. It two pieces of nylon connected in the center by a sewn in foam shoulder strap and where the sewing of the ballistic nylon and the foam shoulder cushion connect ripped in the same place two tiles by two separate people.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Nelson

customer_reviews.title: a great bag
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag for my new 15.6" laptop. This bag fills the bill nicely. Well made, well padded with plenty of storage for add-ons, as well as my usual assortment of things.
customer_reviews.author: Mycroft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laptop Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: It's butterfly opening approach permits faster inspection at the security area at the airports, being FAA approved! You don't have to remove your laptop from the case. It's whisked right through the X-ray.
customer_reviews.author: Wellvideo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag with lots of storage capacity. Fits everything I need. Time will tell if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Hoenig

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: After careful consideration and review of all cases, I selected this one as it best suited my needs. Good protection for the laptop, space allocated for accessories and several compartments for files etc. Good purchase. Brian in Jamaica
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN D. ST. JUSTE

customer_reviews.title: Love how it's airport friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and this make it so much easier to easily grab my laptop out and keep everything else organized. Pretty rugged and durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling with all of your laptop and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A Erbe

customer_reviews.title: This is a good bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag. Lots of room and airport ready. I like all the pockets and easy to access computer slot. The only thing that I do not like is that it doesn't stand up when I set it down. It always falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Financial Credit Union

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bag that has a lot of storage space. I've carried a big laptop, Ipad, and many folders with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag for my 17" HP notebook. Searched the web and decided on this one. Good choice for airport security inspection. Open bag, lay flat on scanner belt, pick-up at other end, put on shoes, get dressed ...........well you get the picture. Bag was easiest part of the check-point process. :) Well worth the price. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for going through security checkpoints
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for going through security checkpoints. I've almost never had to remove my laptop from the bag as a result. I've even been able to go through federal buildings with this bag without removing my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't last 6 months. The shoulder strap attachment point pulled loose from its stitching. Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.author: Autodoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag! I use it for weekly travel. No issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G.

customer_reviews.title: Very usable
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the bag, plenty of easy to access compartments only down side is the shoulder strap, after walking 3-4 blocks it becomes very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Day

customer_reviews.title: A good looking case
customer_reviews.text: This is handsome looking case. Made with high quality material(Nylon). Zip-through is an awesome feature, after getting the case I had two air trips and they never asked me to take out the laptop. i wish this had little more space for little things... overall a very good case....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the air traveller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for air travel. Easy to organize papers and small electronics, just unzip and lay flat to get thru TSA.
customer_reviews.author: NewGranddad

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this bag. It fits *perfectly* underneath the seat of a 737 (contrary to another review here), and is simply the best laptop bag I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality and looks of this bag. It also has plenty of space for other materials.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice case.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case, well made, fits my 17" laptop with room for accessories and papers.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: TSA doesn't care about zip-thru
customer_reviews.text: So I used this for the first time on a trip to Florida. Indianapolis Intl. TSA made me take everything out of it, and Tampa Intl. made me remove laptop and turn it on. Seems a white man in a suit looks pretty dangerous? The case is nice, don't get me wrong, but it didn't work for it's intention.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N. Stein

customer_reviews.title: great laptop case
customer_reviews.text: this case is great. both my son and daughter use it when visiting a friend to tote their laptop. quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Why is the front pocket so small???
customer_reviews.text: This bag would be much better if the front plcket was larger. There doesn't seem to be a logical reason that you would not make the pockets the same size but for some reason it is too small to fit a file folder or magazine or other items that would be nice to have handy.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent work & travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: All around perfect bag. Roomy, tough, organized, professional. This is my second Targus, and I’m obviously a fan. Be sure to size correctly for the laptop. No need to “upsize”.
customer_reviews.author: RadNerd

customer_reviews.title: All in all a winner
customer_reviews.text: Roomy,padded and perfect for carrying your laptop and opens easily and quickly for making it with minimum hassle through the various forms of airport security that seem to have overtaken our world. Spacious inside for all the many computer add-ons and one's usual plethora of notebooks,print-puts,discs and papers in addition to your computer. Wonderfully lightweight and simply styled, like Goldilocks assessment,"the perfect size" to carry-on. Comfortable and handsome in basic black. All in all a winner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It all fits!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while, but I found a bag that can carry my laptop (15inch screen), canon i80 mobile printer, wtih room for ink supplies, car charger, and all other plugs, 100 sheets of paper, pens, markers, calculater, stapler and whatever else may be in my desk that I could need without warning... all at an affordable price. And it is STURDY! My last bag started to rip at the zippers... no such problem here. Great produt!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Real

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for the TSA feature. It has been used a lot and always helps me zip through security. Lots of great compartments and I love the Velcro strap that hooks on the handle of my carry on. This case fits well even under the smallest commuter jet seats. I think I only paid $48 or so last summer when I purchased. See its $20 more now but still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: deuce73

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable to carry
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case offers everything you need. It is extremely comfortable to carry on your shoulder, with a nice padded strap. Your laptop fits securely and there is a separate compartment for your accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Tara A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable, okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is nicely laid out, with the pockets plentiful and easy to access. I like that the hardware is metal and not cheap plastic, which tends to snap under pressure. The laptop pocket should have a clip to secure the laptop into the bag, but has a velcro strap instead. I wish the fabric were one that would more easily wipe clean. Still, for $80, this is a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: JujubeMBA

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It made my trip through the security line at the airport a breeze. I recommend this product to anyone who travels a lot with their laptop.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeRose

customer_reviews.title: Targus Traveler Laptop Case
customer_reviews.text: It has more than enough storage for all needs. In fact it some times requires trial and error to remember where everything is.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Do

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: This bag is too big to fit under an aisle seat of a Boeing 737, which makes it pretty useless for me. I wish I'd known that before buying it. The zip-thru feature works pretty well. Some features are not thought through very well. There is no dedicated storage for the AC adapter that all laptop users carry with them. If you carry anything with a cord in the outer zip pocket, and you also keep pens in the pocket's pen holders, the cord will get tangled up with the pens. The materials and construction seem good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Eben Sprinsock

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong case
customer_reviews.text: The Targus case I received did not open flat like the picture showed on the Amazon page. Targus case #CUST02UA15S does open flat. I received Targus case #CUST02UA15, which I didn't want. Seller denied the wrong case was sent to me. Seller also was not prompt in returning my initial emails. I returned the case for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Targus Corporate Traveler Laptop Briefcase for Slim Commute, TSA Security Checkpoint Friendly, File Section and Compartment Organizer, SafePort Protection fits 16-Inch Laptop, Black (CUCT02UA15S)
product_meta.description:
Size:16 inch| Style:BagThe Targus corporate traveler checkpoint-friendly top load Case helps you clear airport security without removing your laptop from the bag. It features safe port air cushion protection, a checkpoint-friendly zipper and a zippered workstation. You'll stay organized on the go with this case's protective laptop pocket, dedicated file section and removable accessory pouch. Molded handles and a trolley strap make this bag easy to transport. Targus is the leading global supplier of carrying cases and accessories for the mobile lifestyle.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer
feature_bullets: Checkpoint-Friendly--Split design separates laptop from accessories, to allow clear x-ray scanning
Screen Size--Designed to fit 15.4-inch widescreen laptops
Protection--Features the patented SafePort Air Cushion System for maximum laptop protection
Organization--Includes zip-down workstation with business card holder, three pen loops, key clip, multiple accessory compartments and a dedicated file section to organize documents
Ergonomics--Includes leather wrapped nylon handles for added comfort and a padded ergonomic shoulder strap with non-slip coating on the pad to keep the strap in place on your shoulder

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
